senses.synonym: relax: become less tense, rest, or take one's ease; 'He relaxed in the hot tub'; 'Let's all relax after a hard day's work' <i21894>

relations.target: AAVE: a nonstandard form of American English characteristically spoken by African Americans in the United States <i73106>
slack: be inattentive to, or neglect; 'He slacks his attention' <i24836>
